1370: Herardus moved to Cingel.C.3 after marriage.
Got married to Heile at age 32 in 1370.
Had a son with Heile, Herardus, at age 32.
1371: Had a daughter with Heile, Marisseis, at age 33.
1373: Had a son with Heile, Oudrauen, at age 35.
1377: Had a daughter with Heile, Oda, at age 39.
1379: Had a daughter with Heile, Thedwi, at age 41.
1380: Had a daughter with Heile, Imma, at age 42.
1382: Had a son with Heile, Arnekin, at age 44.
1384: Lost daughter Imma when Imma was 5 years old.
1385: Lost son Arnekin when Arnekin was 4 years old.
